scaling_program: CTI Challenge Scaling Plan (applies to instant funded accounts)

criteria.notes: To qualify for scaling, traders must achieve a total profit of at least 10% over the previous four months, with two of those months closing in profit and the account in a net positive state at the time of review【334424731157034†L425-L432】.

caps.notes: The scaling plan caps each funded account at $200,000 and allows a maximum total allocation of $400,000 across two accounts【334424731157034†L431-L437】.

additional_notes: Each increase adds 50% of the original starting balance (e.g., a $100k account grows to $112.5k, then $125k, etc.), maintaining the same trailing drawdown structure【334424731157034†L431-L439】.
